Future of circuits¶

circuits - 1.7 (rocket)¶

  • IPv6 support
  • Fix performance of Poll/EPoll pollers
  • Result Object Proxying
  • Auto Component Init
  • More flexible and intuitive channel separation - Deprecates the use of “target”
